brief: Gets the content of an attribute as a float
name: getFloat()
description: Returns an attribute value of the element as a float. If the defaultValue parameter is specified and the attribute doesn't exist, then defaultValue is returned. If no defaultValue is specified and the attribute doesn't exist, the value 0.0 is returned.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: the non-null full name of the attribute.

parameters.name: defaultValue
parameters.description: the default value of the attribute.
